activeBounties.title: Repo/Docs Improvements
activeBounties.description: Improve the quality of our documentation on GitHub, by making PRs and issues.

activeBounties.title: Original Video Bounty
activeBounties.description: Create and upload original videos on Joystream
activeBounties.notes: Create and upload original videos on Joystream

activeBounties.title: Github Bounty Guide
activeBounties.description: Create a short video guide explaining how to use GitHub for submitting your bounty work.

activeBounties.title: Website Translation
activeBounties.description: Translate the joystream.org website to languages other than English.

activeBounties.title: Translating Update Videos
activeBounties.description: Translate Community Updates videos to non-English languages.

activeBounties.title: Runtime Update Explanation
activeBounties.description: Translate Community Updates videos to non-English languages.

closedBounties.title: Design Community Repo Banner
closedBounties.description: Most of the active repos in the Joystream organization have branded banners in their README.md. The Community Repo also needs one!
closedBounties.notes: Design a banner for the Community Repo

closedBounties.title: Ledger on Joystream
closedBounties.description: Research how well the Ledger hardware wallets are supported, how to use them on the network, derivation paths and key recovery.

closedBounties.title: Research Discord Bots
closedBounties.description: Research, document and create a simple bot for the new Discord server
closedBounties.notes: Research and document bots for the new Discord server

closedBounties.title: Joystream Player Loading
closedBounties.description: The current implementation of the Joystream Player takes a while to load. The scope of this bounty is to look into what can be done to reduce this.

closedBounties.title: Increase Validator Research
closedBounties.description: Research the costs and parameter changes associated with increasing the Validator count substantially.

closedBounties.title: JS Telegram Sticker pack
closedBounties.description: Telegram allows for custom sticker packs to be made. These can spice up the conversation a little, and allows the Joystream Community to let their creativity and design show!

closedBounties.title: Improved Telegram Bot
closedBounties.description: As the bot still has some issues (due to bugs in the initial bot), we want to both fix these, and expand on the functionality.

closedBounties.title: Improve Telegram Bot(s)
closedBounties.description: After the upgrade, we have enabled the polkadot-js extension as part of Pioneer, this bounty is for testing the extension.

closedBounties.title: Testing of 'polkadot-js'
closedBounties.description: After the upgrade, we have enabled the polkadot-js extension as part of Pioneer, this bounty is for testing the extension.

closedBounties.title: Update Telegram Bot
closedBounties.description: As the old bot is not compatible with the new joystream-types, it needs to updated as soon as possible!

closedBounties.title: Discord Video Bot
closedBounties.description: Code a bot that mirrors new uploads to Joystream to a Discord channel
closedBounties.notes: Code a bot that mirrors new uploads to Joystream to a Discord channel

closedBounties.title: Deploy Reliable Endpoints
closedBounties.description: Our endpoint has come under a lot of stress with the large inflow of new users. This bounty covers creating new endpoints.
closedBounties.notes: Deploy a public endpoint with high capacity

closedBounties.title: Polkadot/Substrate Videos
closedBounties.description: Find Channels, Podcasts and Videos covering Polkadot and Substrate

closedBounties.title: Transcribe Community Updates
closedBounties.description: Create summaries and/or transcripts of the Joystream Community Update videos

closedBounties.title: Upload Public Domain Content
closedBounties.description: Upload videos to our testnet, and earn up to $5 per entry! We believe there are some hidden gems available out there, that are licensed permissively.

closedBounties.title: Validator Logging Tool
closedBounties.description: Create a tool to report validator activity
closedBounties.notes: Create a tool to report validator activity
